statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 15 \\ -15 \\ 6 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -26 \\ 29 \\ -14 \\ -36 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
